text: Winter Storage is a 1949 American animated short film produced by Walt Disney Productions and released by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Home media== The short was released on December 11, 2007 on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume Three: 1947-1950. Additional releases include: *2002 - Disney's Countdown to Christmas (VHS) *2004 - Chip 'n Dale Volume 2: Trouble in a Tree (DVD) == References == Category:1949 movies Category:Donald Duck
title: Winter Storage
